LanguageData.VME_TatteredApparel_DontCare.label: don't care
LanguageData.VME_TatteredApparel_DontCare.description: We have bigger concerns to address than holes in our clothes, let's not waste our valuable time fretting or lamenting about such trivialities.
LanguageData.VME_TatteredApparel_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.VME_TatteredApparel_Disapproved.descript: Wearing ratty clothes is uncomfortable and should be avoided.
LanguageData.VME_TatteredApparel_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.VME_TatteredApparel_Abhorrent.descriptio: Ratty clothes are disgusting and should be discarded as soon as possible.
